abstract_summ: The sudden onslaught of the pandemic has acted as an economic shock, and we consider how it is likely to affect different types of manufacturing SMEs . In the shorter run, most SMEs have faced logistical challenges in addition to demand disruptions, although the severity has differed across firms and industries . Policy interventions will also need to be sensitive to the different type of SMEs, rather than adopting a one-size-fits-all approach .
